result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randy Ryan Desjardins

defendant.name: Desjardins, Randy Ryan
defendant.address: N6441 County Rd X East, Glen Flora, WI 54526

records.addlTxt:
1:54 PM Judge Rod Smeltzer appears by video on behalf of Judge Annette Barna. Defendant Randy Ryan Desjardins appeared by video.  Attorney Alysja Otten appeared by video for Randy Ryan Desjardins.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Atty Otten acknowledges information, waives reading. DEF stands mute to all counts. Atty Otten requests that Not Guilty pleas be entered for all counts. Court enters NG Plea to all counts. Court finds probable cause and binds DEF over for trial. Atty Otten requests that the case be set for a Status Conference. State does not object to setting a status conference. Court schedules.
Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Status conference on November 17, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
THIS CASE HAS BEEN ADMINISTRATIVELY TRANSFERRED TO JUDGE ANNETTE BARNA AS JUDGE STEVE ANDERSON HAS RETIRED.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
9:37 AM Defendant Randy Ryan Desjardins in court.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Randy Ryan Desjardins.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Attny Otten indicates to proceed with preliminary hearing.  State calls witness, Sgt Kevin Gillis, sworn in by court.   State begins examination.     9:49 AM  Witness identified the DEF, court indicates the record will reflect.  State continues examination.   9:54 AM  Cross-Examination by Attorney Otten.   Attny Otten no further questions.  9:55 AM  Witness excused.   No further witness by either party.   State makes argument and request for bind over.  Attny Otten makes argument and moves for dismissal of Count 1.  Court finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.  Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Arraignment scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 24, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 24, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Status conference on April 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Follow all requirements of the probation agent of Rusk County, and participate in inpatient treatment.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
08:43 AM Defendant Randy Ryan Desjardins in court with attorney Alysja Otten.  Defendant Randy Ryan Desjardins in custody appears by video.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court calls case and recites appearances.    DOC agent from Rusk County, Elizabeth Pierce appears by video.    DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Court enters NG Plea to Count 2.    Attny Otten filed motion to modify bond.  Court indicates DEF refused to sign bond.  Discussion takes place with Probation agent.  State makes objects to bond modification.   Court modifies bond as requested.   SIBS $2500  Follow all requirements of the probation agent of Rusk County, and participate in inpatient treatment.
Through attorney DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: CASH BOND RETURNED FROM JAIL MARKED REFUSED AS DEFENDANT REFUSED TO SIGN BOND.

11:07 am  Defendant Randy Desjardins in court, in custody appears by video.  Attny Alysja Otten (special appearance) appear by video in court.  Kenneth  Sortedahl appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Probable Cause found by court. DE does not  qualify for PD appointment.    Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy.  State makes bond recommendation.  Attny Otten argues bond.  Court has discussion with DEF regarding bond and treatment.  Court sets bond. CBS $1000   ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843.
